Articles.Content:
I heard that 1.1.3 was going to be about bug fixing. I guess I heard right.

Old persisting bugs like those that are fixed now were many of my greater annoyances.
When I see the dev notes for 1.1.3 about all the bugs they've fixed my belly just warms up instantly, like being in the presence of a hot chick.
So many bugs are now fixed, or limited, it makes me manic (just kidding)

I want to thank our Bug Squad team for their amazing work on getting everything in the game fine tuned, and may I say, close to perfect working order There will always remain room for improvement, and bugs are hard to extinguish, especially in the summer time when the mosquitoes are rampant.
Speaking about Squads hard work and summertime, I think you guys should just lay down, go to a summer resort or other holiday location of your choosing and lay down for a while and forget about 1.2.x for atleast a few weeks.

For anybody who hasn't read the change log for 1.1.3

Link

They also said they added something small in the game, but purposely left out what that would be. If anybody finds out what that small thing is I hope they can tell me.

Clap, clap, clap

Edited June 22, 2016 by Vaporized Steel
*quietly makes fleet of interplanetary probes to visit every stock body in an attempt to find it*

Haha, me personally am not that desperate for an answer. Luckily we have a whole community that does the searching. GG if it´s you I hope it's me though

Edited June 22, 2016 by Vaporized Steel
